text: Timur Igramutdinovich Suleymanov (; born 17 March 2000) is a Russian football player who plays as a centre-forward for FC Nizhny Novgorod on loan from FC Lokomotiv Moscow. ==Club career== He made his debut in the Russian Professional Football League for FC Kazanka Moscow on 17 July 2019 in a game against FC Kolomna. He made his Russian Premier League debut for FC Lokomotiv Moscow on 11 August 2019 in a game against FC Ural Yekaterinburg, as an 85th- minute substitute for Aleksei Miranchuk. On 29 July 2020, he joined FC Nizhny Novgorod on loan for the 2020–21 season. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:2000 births Category:People from Derbent Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:Russia youth international footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:FC Lokomotiv Moscow players Category:FC Nizhny Novgorod (2015) players Category:Russian Premier League players
title: Timur Suleymanov
